attributes.action: Immediately leave the ECHR and stop illegal imigration
attributes.background: To leave ECHR and protect our borders

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Withdraw the UK from the European Convention on Human Rights: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618456

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter UK across the Channel: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621744
